summary: A desperate writer fights for survival when the Mexican mob involves him in murder.
cast: Eric Roberts|Joaquim de Almeida|Victor Rivers|James McManus|Tara Crespo|Michael Peña|Enrique Renaldo|Aixa Maldonado|Ana Mercedes|Felicia Kamriani|Armando José Durán|Alejandro Patiño|Fred Herrera|Felipe De La Rosa|Anselmo Rivera|Mago Mendoza|Joseph Bruley|Stella Doyle
title: La cucaracha
